org.ipdr.api.configuration
Class ConnectionConfigBase

java.lang.Object
  org.ipdr.api.configuration.ConnectionConfigBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionConfigI
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConnectionConfigXml
public abstract class ConnectionConfigBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionConfigI

The class provides a convenient base for ConnectionConfigI implementations
